title: Request to change a user's password
name: ChangePassword

Parameter.description: the user's current password
the user's new password

400: Same password.description: New password cannot be the same as current password

400: Invalid password.description: New password does not match required criteria

title: Request to delete a Pushy Token for the user
name: DeletePushyToken

Success 200.description: true when the pushy token is deleted

title: Request to insert a Pushy Token for the user
name: InsertPushyToken

Parameter.description: the Pushy Token of the user identified in the JWT

Success 200.description: true when the pushy token is inserted

title: Request to register a user
name: Register

Parameter.description: a users first name
a users last name
a users email *required unique
a users password

title: Request to sign a user in
name: SignIn

Success 200.description: true when the name is found and password matches

title: Request to add a chat
name: AddChat

Parameter.description: the name for the chat

Success 201.description: true when the chat room is created

title: Request add a user to a chat room
name: AddUserToChat
description: Adds the user associated with the username/email in the body.

Parameter.description: the chat to add the user to
the username/email of the user being added

401: Unauthorized.description: Only chat room owners can add/delete users

400: Invalid Parameter.description: Malformed parameter. chatId must be a number

title: Requests to delete a chat room
name: DeleteChat
description: Removes all traces of the chat from database

Parameter.description: the chat room to delete

Success 200.description: true when the chat room is deleted

401: Unauthorized.description: Only the chat room owner can delete the chat room

400: Invalid Parameter.description: Malformed parameter. chatId must be a number

title: Request to get the chats a specific user is a part of
name: GetChats
description: Returns the name, ID, and owner of every chat room the user associated with the required JWT is a part of

Success 200.description: List of chatIds of chat rooms user is in
The owner of the chat room's email

400: Invalid Parameter.description: Malformed parameter. chatId must be a number

title: Request to get the emails of all users in a chat
name: GetUsersInChat

Parameter.description: the chat to look up.

Success 200.description: The email for the member in the chat

400: Invalid Parameter.description: Malformed parameter. chatId must be a number

title: Request delete a user from a chat
name: RemoveUserFromChat
description: Does not delete the user associated with the required JWT but instead deletes the user based on the email parameter.

Parameter.description: the chat to delete the user from
the email of the user to delete

401: Unauthorized.description: Only chat room owners can add/delete users

400: Invalid Parameter.description: Malformed parameter. chatId must be a number

title: Accept a user's contact request
name: AcceptContact

Parameter.description: the username or email of the user whose request is being accepted

Success 200.description: the username/email (depending on whether a username or email was passed in the body) of the contact that was deleted

title: Send contact request to user
name: AddContact

Parameter.description: the username or email of the user being sent the contact request

Success 201.description: the username/email (depending on whether a username or email was passed in the request body) of the user being sent the contact request

404: Already contacts.description: User is already in your contacts list

404: Request already sent.description: You've already send this user a contact request

404: Request received.description: User has already sent you a contact request

title: Delete a user from contacts
name: DeleteContact

Parameter.description: the username or email of the contact being deleted

Success 200.description: the username/email (depending on whether a username or email was passed in the body) of the contact that was deleted

title: Get contacts list
name: GetContacts

title: Get incoming contact requests
name: GetIncomingContactRequests

title: Get list of users
name: GetOutgoingContactRequests

Parameter.description: The username/email/name of user being searched for

title: Get outgoing contact requests
name: GetOutgoingContactRequests

title: Request to get chat messages
name: GetMessages
description: Request to get the 10 most recent chat messages from the server in a given chat - chatId. If an optional messageId is provided, return the 10 messages in the chat prior to (and not including) the message containing MessageID.

Parameter.description: the chat to look up.
(Optional) return the 15 messages prior to this message

Success 200.description: List of massages in the message table
The email of the user who poseted this message
The timestamp of when this message was posted

400: Invalid Parameter.description: "Malformed parameter. chatId must be a number"

title: Request to add a message to a specific chat
name: PostMessages
description: Adds the message from the user associated with the required JWT.

Parameter.description: the id of the chat to insert this message into
a message to store
